data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Jessore.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jessore, Khulna, Bangladesh

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 3,463 believers in the county of Jessore to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
There are 2,764,500 people living in the county of Jessore. Only about 3,463 might be believers.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Jessore, Khulna, Bangladesh, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rayeen (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Jessore, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Jessore, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Jessore, Khulna, Bangladesh with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
